title: Grimace Milkshakes From McDonald’s Shake Up the Internet
description: After McDonald’s introduced a beverage named after its bloblike character, Grimace, online video makers went to work.

title: Twitter’s New CEO, Linda Yaccarino, Eases Into the Hot Seat
description: Linda Yaccarino, who initially could not take ad sales meetings because of a noncompete clause, is adjusting to her new role reporting to Elon Musk.
